import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { books } from '../../data/books' import Rating from '../../components/book-slider/Rating' import './BookPage.css' import CartContext from '../../context/CartContext' function BookPage() { window.scroll(0,0) // book link let {param} = useParams() const book = books.find(b => b.id === parseInt(param)) // add to cart using the global context const {addToCart} = useContext(CartContext) const [qty,setQty] = useState(1) return (

{book.title}

by {book.author} (Author)

) } export default BookPage
